verbs.description: [ARG0: assembly probe of mclaughlin mistreatment of aide winds down the state assembly ethics and guidance committee] [V: met] [ARGM-MNR: behind closed doors] [ARGM-TMP: this week] [ARGM-TMP: following a months - long investigation that focused on former state assemblyman steve mclaughlin alleged mistreatment of a female staff member] a person briefed on the matter said that if the committee voted to take any action against mclaughlin it would likely be announced this week by assembly speaker carl heastie possibly as early as thursday mclaughlin assembly speaker carl heastie assembly steve mclaughlin times union jennifer polaro nicholas wilock
